title: Rilke Facade Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic facade definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the facade?

path.description: The path at which to create the facade, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true, creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new facade.

layer.description: Determine which layer it belongs to.

x-prompt.message: Which layer would you like to use it in?

module.x-prompt: Which NgModule would you like to use this facade?

skipProvide.description: Do not provide this facade into the owning NgModule.

ready.description: When true, creates files with ready made code.
